specs.title: Minimum hits for tags cloud
specs.description:
Amount of published entries to consider as minimum when building the tags cloud.
Defaults to 10. Recommended minimum: 5. Set to 1 to disable (setting to 0 will default to 10).

specs.title: Minimum hits for popular searches cloud
specs.description:
Amount of published entries to consider as minimum when building the popular searches cloud.
Defaults to 10. Recommended minimum: 5. Set to 1 to disable (setting to 0 will default to 10).

specs.title: Popular searches cloud widget cache TTL (expiration)
specs.description:
Amount of hours the searches cloud widget should be cached.
Defaults to 1 hour. Set to 0 to disable caching.
Recommended value: depends on the search traffic intensity. For high traffic, 1-3 hours should suffice. For less traffic, 6 hours or more.

specs.title: Version number for searches cloud widget cache
specs.description: Automatically increased on each update. Add <code>1</code to it to force an update.

specs.title: Tags cloud widget cache TTL (expiration)
specs.description:
Amount of hours the tags cloud widget should be cached.
Defaults to 3 hours. Set to 0 to disable caching.
Recommended value: depends on the amount of posts being published and their timing. For constantly updated sites, 3-6 hours should suffice. For less updated sites, 24 hours or more.
